subject: Bitcoin New ATH: $118,000+++
body: View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0394d6b2-7ada-4131-9bd7-21516b48c13f/image.png?t=1725612026) Caption: 📢** ****[Sponsor](https://forms.gle/HcAfDZZeqF7U15Eo6?utm_source=launchy.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=will-coinbase-move-offshore)**** | **💡 **[Telegram](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)**** | **📰** ****[Past Editions](https://launchy.beehiiv.com/)** **Good Morning. ** Strategy ramped up its BTC war chest with a $2B preferred stock offering, signaling peak institutional conviction. Meanwhile, FTX, still haunted by its collapse, gears up for a $1.9B creditor payout. One is stacking BTC like it’s 2021, the other is finally paying for it. ——————————————————————————— **In Toda****y's Email:** * **What Matters:** Strategy Ups Stretch Offering to $2B for BTC 👀 * **Founders Highlight:** Alex Smirnov of deBridge 👨 * **Deal Flow: **Poseidon Raises $15M for Physical AI Data 🌊 You read and share. _We listen and improve_. Send us feedback at [marco@launchy.app](http://marco@launchy.app). “**Narratives: **ETF-driven momentum _For daily market updates and airdrop alphas, check out our __[telegram!](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)_“ — View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d23ac542-c5a8-4ab3-adfb-d5523a23daa6/image.png) Caption: **TOGETHER WITH** ## **Launch Your Brand with Pro-Grade Video, Without Breaking the Bank** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/bad84b22-da3c-499d-9a53-7ca3826ad274/Frame_205__1_.png?t=1746602588) Caption: We just launched something new in Launchy - a full-service video production agency designed specifically for your brand growth! **We specialize in:** * 🚀 Brand launch videos that highlight your products. * 📱 Vertical & horizontal videos optimized for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, IG Reels, and more. * 🎙️ Complete podcast production (video + audio), plus expert content repurposing. * ✂️ Premium video editing for events and in-person moments. We've already worked with over **20 clients** and offer something rare in this space: pricing that's friendlier than any comparable offer you'll find. If you have an upcoming video need or just want to learn more, we’d love to talk. Contact us on Telegram for more info (https://t.me/kp_9961) View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d23ac542-c5a8-4ab3-adfb-d5523a23daa6/image.png) Caption: **WHAT MATTERS** ## **Strategy Ups Stretch Offering to $2B for BTC** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/9f75e175-7b0e-4415-8965-9329fb22d57d/Screen_Shot_2025-07-25_at_12.20.41.png?t=1753420845) Caption: Source: The Block **State of play:** Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) raised its Stretch preferred stock offering from $500M to $2B, pricing shares at $90 with a 9% annual dividend. The proceeds will fund more BTC buys. * Last week, Strategy spent **$739.9M **to acquire **6,220 BTC**. * The purchase brings Strategy’s holdings to **607,770 BTC** worth **$72B+**, or about **3%** of Bitcoin’s 21M total supply. * Strategy’s market cap is **$124B** with common stock trading at $414. Analysts say its BTC stash could grow to 900,000 BTC by 2027. **What’s next: ** **For builders and investors:** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ced873e9-5f9b-4b4e-b926-c8f647899818/image.png) Caption: **BUILDER-INVESTOR HIGHLIGHT** ## **Alex Smirnov of deBridge** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/c87b1963-f0f8-41d8-b5a8-4e087b810de4/image.png?t=1753421014) Caption: **Intro: **[Alex Smirnov](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alekseismirnov/?originalSubdomain=ae) is the Co-Founder and the Project Lead of [deBridge](https://debridge.finance/), a cross-chain interoperability and liquidity transfer protocol that allows the truly decentralized transfer of assets between various blockchains. **Previous background: **Before deBridge, Alex founded Phenom, a crypto custody startup focused on secure cold storage and key management for institutions. He was Head of R&D at Navigine (2014–2017), developing real-time indoor navigation systems. * Earlier, he worked as a research engineer at Moscow State University and holds a Ph.D. in Mathematics and Physics from MSU. **The big idea: **Alex, through deBridge, is aiming to create a universal infrastructure for seamless, decentralized cross-chain communication and asset transfer. ——————————————————————————— _Take a peek at our referral reward at the bottom of this issue. Share this newsletter and receive our list of __**500 crypto VC individuals **_👇 View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/bc887b6a-52b0-4aa1-8763-ef01358ef161/image.png) Caption: **INSIGHTS** ## **FTX to Begin $1.9B Creditor Payout on Sep 30** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ecbbbe0e-ff9a-48da-bc41-17819696df2d/image.png?t=1753421478) Caption: **State of play:** FTX [will start its next creditor payout ](https://www.theblock.co/post/364059/ftx-next-creditor-payout-sep-30)on Sep 30 after a court approved reducing its claims reserve by **$1.9B**, freeing funds for distribution. So far, **$6.2B** has been paid out, with the total plan targeting **$14.7B to $16.5B** in recoveries. * About **98%** of creditors are set to receive at least** 119%** of their original claims. * Payouts will be made via BitGo, Kraken, and Payoneer. * A controversial motion to forfeit claims in restricted countries was revised by the court to allow alternative transfer options. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/bc887b6a-52b0-4aa1-8763-ef01358ef161/image.png) Caption: **DEAL FLOWS** ## **Poseidon Raises $15M for Physical AI Data** Tweet: (https://twitter.com/psdnai/status/1947690488011886738) _Deal flows slowed down this week - we saw $91M in deals _💼_ _ Poseidon[ has raised a $15M seed round](https://x.com/psdnai/status/1947690488011886738) led by a16z crypto to build infrastructure for collecting and licensing real-world data used in physical AI, including robotics and autonomous systems. * Incubated by Story Protocol, Poseidon will serve enterprise AI teams needing curated, traceable datasets. * The round supports scaling data pipelines, IP registration, and expansion into video, audio, biometric, and healthcare data. * Founders Sandeep Chinchali and Sarick Shah aim to solve AI’s growing data bottleneck as models move beyond the digital world. ##### **Deal flows in the past week:** * [Quack AI](https://x.com/QuackAI_AI/status/1947276710791254016), $3.6M Seed Round * [Questflow](https://x.com/questflow/status/1947469033500250171), $6.5M Seed Round * [ACM+](https://x.com/ACM_Plus/status/1946145185806872948), $12M Seed Round * [Poseidon](https://x.com/psdnai/status/1947690488011886738), $15M Seed Round * [DSRV](https://n.news.naver.com/mnews/article/018/0006071803), $11.6M Series B Round * [Soluna](https://x.com/SolunaHoldings/status/1947645065905463773), $20M Equity Round * [xTAO](https://x.com/TheBlock__/status/1947452522504839289), $22.8M Equity Round View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/89d61719-6efa-4f8e-8543-f7ba5606ee4e/image.png) Caption: **QUICK BITES** * **OG bitcoin wallet** [moves](https://www.theblock.co/post/364112/decade-bitcoin-wallet-address-whale) 3,962 BTC worth over $460M. * **BitMine Immersion’s ETH stash** [doubles](https://www.theblock.co/post/364028/kraken-to-integrate-ink-token) to more than $2B. * **JPMorgan** [says](https://www.theblock.co/post/364144/jpmorgan-crypto-inflows-60-billion-ytd-regulatory-push) crypto inflows have surged to $60B year to date. * **GameSquare** [purchases](https://www.theblock.co/post/364179/ethereum-holding-company-gamesquare-purchases-cryptopunk-nft-as-treasury-asset-for-5-15-million-in-preferred-shares) CryptoPunk as treasury asset for $5.15M. * **Christie's **[offers](https://www.theblock.co/post/364227/christies-offers-1-billion-in-luxury-real-estate-to-buyers-paying-with-crypto-nyt) $1B in luxury real estate to buyers paying with crypto. * **FTX** [to start ](https://www.theblock.co/post/364059/ftx-next-creditor-payout-sep-30)next creditor payout on Sep. 30 with $1.9B granted by court. * **Anchorage** [to issue](https://www.theblock.co/post/364119/anchorage-digital-genius-stablecoin-ethena) first GENIUS‑compliant stablecoin in US with Ethena. * **Strategy** [upsizes](https://www.theblock.co/post/364199/strategy-upsizes-stretch-stock-bitcoin) preferred 'Stretch' stock offering to $2B to buy more BTC. * **Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen** [sends](https://www.theblock.co/post/364164/ripple-chris-larsen-xrp-zachxbt) roughly $140M in XRP to exchanges. * **BlackRock’s ETHA** [becomes](https://www.theblock.co/post/364134/blackrocks-etha-ethereum-fund-becomes-third-ever-etf-to-hit-10-billion-in-assets-within-one-year) third-ever ETF to hit $10B in assets within a year.
